job_tasks.phrase: Het ontwerpen en implementeren van AI-architecturen gebaseerd op large language models (LLMs) zoals GPT en andere geavanceerde AI-modellen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the design and implementation of AI architectures, specifically mentioning LLMs and advanced AI models, which falls under model development and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Het bouwen van schaalbare AI-oplossingen en het ontwerpen van flexibele, toekomstbestendige architecturen voor cloudomgevingen zoals Azure
job_tasks.justification: This phrase focuses on building scalable solutions and designing architectures for cloud environments, which are core software development and integration tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Het ontwikkelen en beheren van AI-modellen, van proof-of-concept tot productie, waarbij je zorgt voor naadloze integratie en deployment op cloudplatforms
job_tasks.justification: This describes the end-to-end lifecycle of AI models, from development to production deployment and integration on cloud platforms, aligning with MLOps principles.

job_tasks.phrase: Het toepassen van vaardigheden in prompt engineering om LLMs te optimaliseren en aan te passen aan specifieke klantbehoeften en use-cases
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions 'prompt engineering' and its application to optimize LLMs for specific needs, fitting directly into this category.

job_tasks.phrase: Het combineren van GenAI-kennis met traditionele machine learning-technieken en frameworks zoals Python , TensorFlow , en PyTorch om hybride AI-oplossingen te realiseren.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the realization of hybrid AI solutions by combining GenAI with traditional ML techniques and specific frameworks, which falls under model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Het bouwen en beheren van API's voor AI-diensten, inclusief API-management en beveiliging.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves building and managing APIs for AI services, which is a core software development and integration activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met klanten en interne teams om hun AI-behoeften te begrijpen en te vertalen naar waardevolle, data-gedreven oplossingen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights understanding client needs and translating them into solutions, which is a key aspect of business understanding and strategy.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken met klanten en interne teams om hun AI-behoeften te begrijpen en te vertalen naar waardevolle, data-gedreven oplossingen.

profile.rationale: The job ad describes a balanced mix of tasks. It includes designing and implementing AI architectures based on LLMs (1.B.1), prompt engineering (1.B.2), and combining GenAI with traditional ML techniques (1.B.1). Simultaneously, it emphasizes building scalable AI solutions, designing architectures for cloud environments (1.A.1), managing model deployment (1.A.2), and building APIs (1.A.1). The mention of specific LLMs (GPT) and frameworks (Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch) further supports this profile. The role clearly involves both core software engineering practices and specialized GenAI tasks.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and detailed, explicitly mentioning key GenAI concepts like LLMs and prompt engineering, alongside core software engineering tasks like architecture design, cloud deployment, and API management. The language used directly maps to the defined categories, leaving little room for ambiguity.
